briefTitle: 3-year Study in Dry Eye Disease Patients With Severe Keratitis Receiving Ikervis速 (1mg/mL Ciclosporin)
officialTitle: A Phase IIIb, Prospective, Interventional, Multicentre, 3-year Study to Explore the Long-term Evolution of Sign and Symptoms, and Occurence of Complications in Dry Eye Patients With Severe Keratitis Receiving Ikervis速 (1mg/mL Ciclosporin)
conditions: Dry Eye Disease With Severe Keratitis
summary: The proposed 36-month Post Approval Efficacy Study (PAES) is a prospective, interventional, multicentre study to explore the long-term evolution of signs and symptoms, and occurrence of complications in Dry Eye Disease (DED) patients with severe keratitis receiving Ikervis速 (1mg/mL ciclosporin) eye drops administered once daily

primaryOutcome.measure: The Correlation Between Mean Change From Baseline in Corneal Fluorescein Staining (CFS) Score and Symptom Assessment iN Dry Eye (SANDE) Symptoms Score at Each Visit.
